title: Open API Access
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to have access to well-documented APIs so that I can easily integrate third-party applications into the ALFRED platform and ensure secure and efficient functionality.

title: User Command Customization
summary: As a developer, I want to create custom voice commands that can be recognized by ALFRED so that elderly users can interact with the system in a personalized manner.

title: Interactive Response System
summary: As a developer, I want ALFRED to engage users with interactive responses and follow-up questions so that I can create applications that enhance user engagement and ensure clarity in communication.

title: Voice Command Error Handling
summary: As a developer, I want robust error handling for misunderstood voice commands so that users can receive helpful suggestions and reformulate their requests easily.

title: Multilingual Support for User Interaction
summary: As a developer, I want ALFRED to support multiple languages for voice interaction so that I can create applications that cater to a diverse user base and enhance accessibility for elderly users who speak different languages.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Developers
summary: As a developer, I want a mechanism to receive feedback on my applications' performance and user interactions within ALFRED so that I can improve my applications based on actionable insights.
